SET(CPU_SUBENV_FILES)
SET(CPU_SUBENV_FILES ${CPU_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cpu_interface.svi)
SET(CPU_SUBENV_FILES ${CPU_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cpu_transaction.sv)
SET(CPU_SUBENV_FILES ${CPU_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cpu_define.sv)
SET(CPU_SUBENV_FILES ${CPU_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cpu_generator.sv)
SET(CPU_SUBENV_FILES ${CPU_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cpu_driver.sv)
SET(CPU_SUBENV_FILES ${CPU_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cpu_scoreboard.sv)
SET(CPU_SUBENV_FILES ${CPU_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cpu_env.sv)

SET(CPU_SUBENV_FILES ${CPU_SUBENV_FILES} PARENT_SCOPE)
SET(CPU_SUBENV_INC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} PARENT_SCOPE)
